name: LingSoundTest
0:
”Alexa, start Ling Sound Test.”
”Alexa, run Ling Sound Test.”
”Alexa, ask Ling Sound Test to do a test.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ling sound test
des:
The Ling Six Sound Test is a simple tool for checking if your natural hearing or amplification devices are giving you access to all speech sounds.

Sounds will play in random order, with a random-length pause between each sound. 

For more information, see https://blog.medel.com/all-about-the-ling-six-sound-test/
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
